title: Turn off skin borders
body:
Hello
I just bought the package for Neeko's Star Guardian skins that also comes with a border, that I don't like at all, but it was the only way to get the Towa icon.
Is there a way to turn off borders ? It would be an awesome feature to have in the future.
Thank you and have a bright day !
 {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
